page.title: 10RURAL LANDSCAPES
page.content: The area is mainly used for agricultural purposes. There are at least 12 farms, ranging from small dairy to large arables. Our farming surveys showed that the farmers enjoyed their work because they could spend time in the open air and because they liked to be there own boss. They most disliked the uncertainty of the weather. It did not always do what the farmers wanted it to do. Harvesting is the busiest time of the year. We found out about three farms from the children who live on or near the farm or whose parents work on the farm.
